keyword: calories in chicken thigh with skin
title: Calories in Chicken Thigh with Skin
meta_description: Learn calories in chicken thigh with skin per 100g, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition details for easy tracking.
h1: Calories in Chicken Thigh with Skin
assumptions: Cooked (roasted), bone-in but edible meat and skin portion, no added oils or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cooking method, portion size, brand, and added ingredients. Check labels or sources for precision.

quick_answer.text: 100g of roasted chicken thigh with skin provides ~229 kcal and ~23g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Fried in oil (adds ~1 tsp oil per 100g)

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g chicken thigh with skin?
faqs.a: Approximately 229 kcal for roasted chicken thigh with skin.

faqs.q: What's the protein in chicken thigh with skin?
Does skin add a lot of fat to chicken thigh?
faqs.a: Yes, skin contributes ~15.5g total fat per 100g, including 4.3g saturated.

faqs.q: Are carbs in chicken thigh with skin?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugars in plain roasted chicken thigh with skin.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in chicken thigh with skin?
faqs.a: Roasting is lower calorie; frying or breading can add 40+ kcal per 100g.
